channel.title: How the Internet Works on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in How the Internet Works on Orange Academy

item.title: Inner Workings of the Web
item.description: Learning Objectives Describe the basics of how computers communicate Name 4 ways that computers share data Define the following concepts: Internet IP Address IPv4 and IPv6 addresses static and dynamic dotted decimal notation port socket Internet Domain URL Messages and Packets Communication protocols IP TCP UDP HTTP lots of others Routes LAN and WAN ping command ifconfig / ipconfig commands DNS MIME Types RESTful Web Services What is the Internet?
